info.title: Entity Squasher API
info.description: SPI middleware component: provides entity squashing services.

post.description: Pulls common entities from a set of adapters, and squashes them together, based on the supplied algorithm.

parameters.name: Squasher Request
parameters.description: A JSON payload containing entity references, the required entity and the fields.

parameters.name: X-Internal-Request-Id
parameters.description: An internal request id. Should be a vaild guid. Required for logging purposes.

parameters.name: X-External-Request-Id
parameters.description: An optional external request id. Used in logging.

206.description: The squashing was a partial success - one or more requested adapters threw a non-successful response.

404.description: The specified algorithm could not be found.

424.description: The squashing was a failure, due to all of the requested adapters throwing non-successful responses.

500.description: There was a problem with the request - and this could be different things depending on the context. See body of response for more detail.

get.description: Standard diagnostics method, used to test the health of the facade's underlying system.

200.description: The standard/only response from the method.

message.example: Unable to serve any requests - all adapters are unavailable.

statusCode.description: The status code thrown with the error.
